summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding a Q&A document, with comments left for review. It appears to be internal office communication related to case preparation.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, working in the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, sending a Q&A document for review with comments.

events.title: Email regarding Q&A document

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 24, 2021.
It originates from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email discusses a Q&A document with comments left for review.
The communication suggests ongoing legal preparation or coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office.
